title: 8 Things I’ve Learned Over the Last Six Years Working With React
teaser: Time flies. Five years ago we evaluated React, Angular, and Vue in our team and decided to go with React.

title: How to Use React in a Ruby on Rails App
teaser: I started working with React 5 years ago. Due to the Rails experience in the team, rails were set as the backend and for the frontend. After a short evaluation of Angular, React and Vue.js, React convinced us the most at that time.

title: Gems for your Ruby on Rails application to make testing fun
teaser: 20 years ago, when I started working as a programmer, we had our own test departments and teams that were only responsible for testing. There were hardly any automated tests. Everything was tested using textually described manual test cases.

title: 5 Things you can do to make your (React based) website load super fast
teaser: React is one of the most popular libraries to create comprehensive single page applications.
